definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Hua Mulan, legendary woman warrior (c. fifth century), Northern dynasties folk hero recorded in Sui and Tang literature

sentences.english: Dogs are not allowed to bring into parks, for they may destroy the flowers in it.
sentences.chinese: 由於狗可能會破壞花木，所以不允許把狗帶進公園。

sentences.english: It has landscaped grounds have an open and quiet ambience.
sentences.chinese: 它具有開放的花木場寧靜氛圍。

sentences.english: Whole Xuchang will also build up a flowers and trees variety completely.
sentences.chinese: 整個許昌市還將建成花木品種齊全。

sentences.english: I think Hua Mulan is a woman.
sentences.chinese: 但在我看來花木蘭只是一位女性。

sentences.english: Even as he is for your growth so is he for your pruning.
sentences.chinese: 即使它會助你成長，也會像修剪花木一般對你。

sentences.english: People may not pick flowers in this garden.
What long handle double flowers and trees produces Chinese Hunan and Jiangxi southern part is a mountainous area.
sentences.chinese: 長柄雙花木產中國湖南及江西南部的山區。

sentences.english: He was glad to find the garden unrooted out.
sentences.chinese: 他很高興發現園中的花木未被連根拔起。

sentences.english: Second, I enjoy taking care of my plants with my family.
sentences.chinese: 第二，我喜歡和家人一起照顧花木。

sentences.english: Plants were arranged on either side of the path, and clustered about the door.
sentences.chinese: 小徑兩旁都種植着花木，團團簇簇地環繞着門口。

sentences.english: The neighbors devastated the garden and pillaged the rare flowers.
sentences.chinese: 左右鄰居竊取了花園，劫掠了那些稀有的花木。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, it could recycle as "flower nutrition substance"and had higher economic value.
sentences.chinese: 同時作爲“花木營養基質”再利用有較高的經濟價值。

sentences.english: Wintersweet (Chimonanthus praecox Link), native to China, is one of the famous and precious woody plants with a long cultivation history.
sentences.chinese: 蠟梅特產中國，是栽培歷史悠久的名貴花木。

sentences.english: We saw a Ming dynasty carved wooden pillow in the store.
sentences.chinese: 我們在古玩店看見了一隻明代的雕花木枕。

sentences.english: If you want good crops of flowers and vegetables you must keep the weeds down.
sentences.chinese: 要想花木和蔬菜長得好，就必須除掉雜草。

sentences.english: Tree species of Yulania Spach is Chinese traditional ornamental, officinal plant and spiceberry.
sentences.chinese: 玉蘭屬樹種是中國傳統觀賞花木和藥用及香料植物。

definition: verdant/lush green and full of life
